mapper.select: SELECT p.payment_id, pp.process_id, pp.reservation_id, p.payment_method, pp.provider, pp.session_id, pp.process_status, pp.created_at, p.transaction_id, pp.redirect_url, pp.created_at FROM payment_process pp JOIN payment p ON p.reservation_id = pp.reservation_id JOIN reservation r ON r.reservation_id = pp.reservation_id ORDER BY pp.created_at DESC;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO payment_process ( reservation_id, provider, session_id, process_status, redirect_url ) VALUES ( #{reservationId}, #{provider}, #{sessionId}, #{processStatus}, #{redirectUrl} );
